Title: Gotcha!
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Patrick McHale (story by), Kent Osborne (story by), Pendleton Ward (story by), Cole Sanchez, Rebecca Sugar
Actors: John DiMaggio, Jeremy Shada, Niki Yang, Pendleton Ward
Plot: Lumpy Space Princess sets out to write a book on how to catch a man and goes undercover as Finn and Jake's secretary in order to seduce Finn.
